      • updateTimestamps

        boolean updateTimestamps​(Integer serviceId,
                         long oldRunTimeStamp,
                         long oldNextRunTimeStamp,
                         long newRunTimeStamp,
                         long newNextRunTimeStamp)
        Updates a database row with the matching values. This way we can ensure atomic operation for acquiring the semaphore for a service, independent of the underlying database isolation level.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - id
        oldRunTimeStamp - stamp
        oldNextRunTimeStamp - stamp
        newRunTimeStamp - stamp
        newNextRunTimeStamp - stamp
        Returns:
        true if 1 row was updated
